svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of population with developmental intellectual disability vs. GDP per
Share of the population with 'idiopathic developmental intellectual disability' versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita,
measured in 2011 international-$. 'Idiopathic developmental intellectual disability' which is a category of disorders defined by
delayed or impaired speech, language, motor condition, and visuo-spatial skills.
Share of population with developmental intellectual disability
